::Galaxor/Lavatron::

Galaxor stumbles back, managing to stay upright despite the fact that
the shots had made two dents in his chest. He growls and fires two
missiles at Abominus, one at his head and one at his chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(Yup, Lavatron's still here)

Seeing his foe distracted, Lavatron aims his palm, firing a large
lightning blast at Surgital's head.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Ok.  I'm going to post with Abominus in this post too.  Sorry
if I miss any damage!  And also, rAuq or Jer or whoever, what are you
going to do with Symphony?  And Airly, where did I leave off with
Orchestra and what should he be doing?  Hehe, I'm trying to get back
on track!  And also Yan, is Lavatron still at the CF?  I don't know,
so I'm just going to have Surgital attack the CF.  Also, I'm not sure
of what weapons Abominus has, so I don't know what weapon he'll fire,
so that will be up to you guys.
> 
> ::Abominus/Surgital/Composer/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::
> 
>      Abominus was hit in the left shoulder by a few missiles, and
his body tilted more to the left and he stumbled back a bit.  Then,
more missiles came from Galaxor and Element.  He put out his arm to
try and block.  Some of the missiles hit his arm and damaged it a bit,
and some got past and hit him in the chest.  Abominus fired 2 shots
from his weapon at Galaxor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>          Surgital aimed his elbow at the CF, and fired a missile
from his elbow at it.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Composer decided to flee back to the Alliance base.
> 
>         "Commander Zardus, I'm heading back to the Alliance base,
sir," Composer said in his com to Zardus.
> 
>         Then, Composer used his jetpack and thrusted off towards the
Alliance Island.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Triggerhappy and Skullgrin nodded at eachother at Megatron's
orders, then walked outside, and went to Megatron's location.
> 
>          "Triggerhappy reporting for duty sir!" Triggerhappy said,
saluting.
> 
>           Skullgrin saluted as well, but remained silent.
